bibl.title: Zenobia between Reality and Legend. A Re-examination of the Life of Zenobia, Queen of Palmyra (Syria), and her Struggle with the Roman Empire and Other Powers in the 3rd Century AD. Preface by Claudine DAUPHIN. (BAR International Series. 1169.)
bibl.note: ZAHRAN Yasmine, Zenobia between Reality and Legend. A Re-examination of the Life of Zenobia, Queen of Palmyra (Syria), and her Struggle with the Roman Empire and Other Powers in the 3rd Century AD. Preface by Claudine DAUPHIN. (BAR International Series. 1169.)
Oxford, Archaeopress, 2003, 4°, xv-130 pp., figg., cartes. ISBN 978-1-84171-537-7. £33.
